name: CalcifyTech
description: Calcify Tech is a decentralized compute marketplace that provides fair, transparent, and on-demand access to GPU, CPU, and memory resources via smart contracts. Designed for AI developers, Web3 projects, and enterprises, it eliminates intermediaries to offer scalable and cost-efficient computing power. Through tokenized incentives, Calcify enables users to earn rewards by sharing idle compute resources. Unlike traditional cloud services, Calcify is permissionless, programmable, and verifiableâ€”empowering real-world AI and blockchain workloads. It aims to become the execution layer of Web3 by enabling secure, decentralized, and autonomous task execution on a global scale.
